RelatedSentence: The National Wild Turkey Federation ( NWTF ) awarded a $ 5,000 National Future Farmers of America ( FFA ) Collegiate Scholarship to Zayne Aldrich of Neosho , Missouri .
Aldrich is wrapping up his senior year at Neosho High School while maintaining a 3.79 GPA , ranking near the top of his graduating class .
